caption: Figure 2 | Adjusted score distribution of the Magpie datasets. We calculate the average ArmoRM score of the generated responses in the Magpie dataset to guide data selection. We also manually reduce the Air and Pro (Llama 3) subsets to prioritize data synthesized by stronger models. The dashed vertical lines in the plot represent the mean ArmoRM scores for each subset.
description: The chart displays the distribution of ArmoRM scores for different subsets of the Magpie dataset, showing how the average scores differ based on the model used to generate the data.
